ygData.subject: Re: Today's patch
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, after talking to some guild friends last night (while we were in PoF clearing stuff prior to smooshing a dracoliche), turns out that some necros were
ygData.messageBody:
Well, after talking to some guild friends last night (while we were in PoF
clearing stuff prior to smooshing a dracoliche), turns out that some necros
were doing mana transfers, dueling down and doing it again. Guess they
(verant) wanted to cut off unlimted sources of mana.

Dunno about the casters binding nearby and such. That's a pretty common
tactic for dragon runs. Bind in the lair. Chain cast your ice comets. Die
(no need to duel down - Naggy or Vox will usually oblige.) Mem fast and cast
nekkid.

Sylly

p.s. I left a bit after midnight after the draco died. I guess the rest of
the folks were pumped up. Heard they stayed til 8am this morning and
smooshed CazT too. He dropped "that damn flute" - gratzi to Kaldivar!

p.s.s. got feared once but lived thru the draco fight! woo hoo! Berzerker
& Niv's. I got hit with some enchanter spell (Shiftless deeds?) and had
Disenchanting memmed so I F1'd and disspelled. I was using it to try to
disspell mobs with damage shields too - I think it was working judging from
the messages

[Wed Feb 23 22:37:52 2000] Decantur was burned.
[Wed Feb 23 22:37:52 2000] Shaytana was burned.
[Wed Feb 23 22:37:52 2000] Ataras was burned.
[Wed Feb 23 22:37:52 2000] YOU are burned!
[Wed Feb 23 22:37:53 2000] You slash a fetid fiend for 14 points of damage.

target and play song - watch for burn messages as other are fighting and
finally they stop

[Wed Feb 23 22:38:11 2000] a fetid fiend is encased in frost.
[Wed Feb 23 22:38:11 2000]
[Wed Feb 23 22:38:11 2000] You slash a fetid fiend for 21 points of damage.


p.s.s.s. Heh:

[Wed Feb 23 23:59:59 2000] Cazic Thule shouts 'Denizens of Fear, your
master commands you to come forth to my aid!!
[Wed Feb 23 23:59:59 2000] a scareling says 'We obey!


----- Original Message -----
From: <kim@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, February 23, 2000 4:45 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Today's patch


> From: <kim@...>
>
> On Wed, 23 Feb 2000 jhenders@... wrote:
> >
> > My problem with this explanation is that most other changes like this to
> > were done just to the PvP servers, not every server. Why was this done
> > to all the servers to address a problem specific to the PvP servers?
>
> My guess is since casters can be bound anywhere, they'd bind
> themselves nearby (in a safe spot), group would fight mob,
> caster would unload mana, pre-arranged duel friend would kill
> caster, caster would respawn with full mana and join the fight
> again.
